title: Tile, mid-18th century
dimensions: H x W x D (laying flat): 11.9 x 12.5 cm (4 11/16 x 4 15/16 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Square tile. Decorated in "Fazackerley colors" on white ground.  Subject a blue vase with flowers in blue, yellow, manganese and brown; leaves sage green, with black veins.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, mid-18th century.
mid-18th century. Tin-enamelled earthenware. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1938-12-5.
